Package org.xbmc.httpapi

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BroadcastListener
    Implementation of XBMC's broadcast feature.
    BroadcastListener.Event
    The object that is returned upon
    Connection
    Singleton class.
    HttpApi
    Wrapper class for our HTTP clients.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NoNetworkException
    Throw this exception if network is not available on the device
    NoSettingsException
    Throw this exception if setting values were empty.
    WifiStateException  
    WrongDataFormatException
    Throw this exception if API response is something different than expected.
